name: CorporateStays.com
tag_list: corporate-housing, furnished-apartments, temporary-stays, short-term-rentals, luxury-rentals, serviced-apartments, high-end-vacation-rentals, executive-suites
overview: CorporateStays.com is a dynamic company specializing in executive housing, offering high-end serviced apartments to Corporate clients. We strive to maintain our industry leading position across Canada and Central America by providing the most cost efficient solutions that ensure a smooth transition when a temporary or permanent move is required. We maximize the guest experience by offering the most complete service solution and exclusive collection of apartment rentals in our regions. Our portfolio of rental properties features the best quality suites in corporate housing. By partnering with industry specialists, HR, GMS, governmental entities and other stakeholders, we respond quickly and accurately to the housing requirements of the global relocation process. We work very closely with our Guests, Corporate Accounts & Partners in order to ensure that we maximize their business, leisure, social and cultural experiences. Travel Home with CorporateStays.com

milestones.description:
MyStudioMontreal.com belongs to the CorporateStays.com Network. MyStudioMontreal.com is the leader in short term furnished rentals in Montreal.
